title: Focus on What Matters: Fisher-Guided Adaptive Multimodal Fusion for Vulnerability Detection
summary: Software vulnerability detection is a critical task for securing software systems and can be formulated as a binary classification problem: given a code snippet, determine whether it contains a vulnerability.
